install.name: VirtueMart Product Snapshot
install.author: The VirtueMart Development Team
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2004-2008 Soeren Eberhardt-Biermann. All rights reserved.
install.description: Show Product Snapshots in Content (Let's you add/edit snapshots of products in your VirtueMart. Enter multiple products by separating them with a |.)

param.name: showname
param.label: Show product name?
param.description: Defines whether or not to show the name of the product

param.name: showimage
param.label: Show product thumbnail?
param.description: Defines whether or not to show the thumbnail of the product

param.name: showdesc
param.label: Show product short description?
param.description: Defines whether or not to show the short description of the product

param.name: showprice
param.label: Show product price?
param.description: Defines whether or not to show the price of the product

param.name: quantity
param.label: How many to add to cart?

param.name: showaddtocart
param.label: Show 'add to cart' link?
param.description: Defines whether or not to show the price of the product

param.name: displayeach
param.label: Display orientation for product info
param.description: Defines the orientation of the display of product name, image etc for each product

param.name: displaylist
param.label: Display orientation for each product
param.description: Defines the orientation of the display each product. Only applies if there is more than one product in the snapshot (for multiple products enter the ids separated by |)
